title: ðŸš¨ Chiefs trade Tyreek Hill to Dolphins for haul of picks + Winners & Losers - Emergency Podcast (NFL 3/23)
description:
Another day, another blockbuster in the NFL. Tyreek Hill couldn't get a deal figured out with the Chiefs, so he was promptly traded to the Dolphins. On this episode, Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan and Jordan Dajani to break down the winners and losers of the deal. Patrick MahomesÂ loses one of the top playmakers in the league and Kansas City loses more ground in the AFC West. Meanwhile, Miami adds more firepower to help out Tua Tagovailoa and new coach Mike McDaniel. Join the crew as they discuss impact on odds, fantasy football and much more!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix

On this episode, Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan and Jordan Dajani to break down the winners and losers of the deal. Patrick MahomesÂ loses one of the top playmakers in the league and Kansas City loses more ground in the AFC West. Meanwhile, Miami adds more firepower to help out Tua Tagovailoa and new coach Mike McDaniel. Join the crew as they discuss impact on odds, fantasy football and much more!
